for example ::home
it says
“you need a strength level of atleast 70 to enter the Strength guild.”
“welcome home.”[/quote]Your brackets are screwed up. None are missing and there’s not an extra, they’re just in the wrong spots.

item.title: I cant get the game to send the right message the right time for my command
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

^ True. Helpful tip: that else is what happens if playerLevel[1] is anything else than >= 70. That’s why teleport isn’t used.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get the game to send the right message the right time for my command

item.title: I cant get the game to send the right message the right time for my command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("strguild") && playerLevel[1] >= 70) { teleportToX = 2758; teleportToY = 3513; sendMessage("Welcome to the Strength guild."); } else { sendMessage("You need a Strength level of at least 70 to enter the Strength guild."); }

That should work. All you needed was an else statement.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get the game to send the right message the right time for my command

item.title: I cant get the game to send the right message the right time for my command
item.dc:creator: @gelert gelert
item.description:
@gelert wrote:

Im creating a str guild.

here is my command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“strguild”)&& playerRights >= 0){
if (playerLevel[1] >= 70)
teleportToX = 2758;
teleportToY = 3513;
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Strength guild.”);
if (teleport == false);
sendMessage(“You need a Strength level of at least 70 to enter the Strength guild.”);
}

my understanding of what i have rote.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“strguild”)&& playerRights >= 0){
if (playerLevel[1] >= 70)
teleportToX = 2758;
teleportToY = 3513;
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Strength guild.”);
i think this means in the command is strguild and and player level 1(str) is lvl 70
teleport to 2758-3513 and sendmessage welcome to the str guild.

the second part of the command i wasnt shure how to do
but i though this would work

if (teleport == false);
sendMessage(“You need a Strength level of at least 70 to enter the Strength guild.”);
}

i think this means if the teleport == false(means it didnt tele) send message
that you need a str lvl of 70 to enter

my problem is that if you dont have the level it sends both of the messages
and if u have lvl 70 str it teles you and says you need a str lvl of 70 to enter.
and when i type other commands it sends one of thoese messages

i know im a newby coder so dont make fun of me

Read full topic
